## How to contact us

Join the [https://join.slack.com/t/curatedcollections/shared_invite/zt-3g65gd6jo-6FkQItCbAaMh26RMK9zJPA](project Slack)

You can also email [mailto:m.lynch@sydney.edu.au](m.lynch@sydney.edu.au) or register a collection in the repository.

## Register a collection

You can let us know about your collection by creating an issue
on the Curated Collections GitHub repository:

[https://github.com/Sydney-Informatics-Hub/CuratedCollections/issues](Issues)

If you don't want to use Git, you can let us know about your interest on Slack or via email.
